regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re from AADecoder import AADecoder def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 inf=re.findall('script>([^<]+)[\w\W]*?file.+?\+[\'"]([^\'"]+)',page_data)[0] html=re.findall("=\s*'([^']+).+?\s+'([^']+)",AADecoder(inf[0]).decode())[0] return html[0]+inf[1]+html[1]+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer=$doregex[link]'

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 source=requests.get('https://www.watchbox.de/[makelist.param1]',headers={'Referer':'https://www.watchbox.de/genres/','User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0','Accept':'*/*'}).content.decode('ascii','ignore') inf=re.findall('data-endpoint="/(.*?)".*\n.*?pageId":"(\d+)',source)[0] headers={'Referer':'https://www.watchbox.de/[makelist.param1]','X-Requested-With':'XMLHttpRequest','User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0','Accept':'*/*'} data=[] urls=['https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=1&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1]),'https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=2&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1]), 'https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=3&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1]),'https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=4&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1]), 'https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=5&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1]),'https://www.watchbox.de/%s?page=6&ajax=true&pageId=%s'%(inf[0],inf[1])] for page in urls: source=requests.get(page,headers=headers).content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('\\n','').replace('\\','');data +=re.findall('(?s)data-asset-title="(.*?)".+?data-src="//(.*?)".*?href="/([^"]+)',source) return data

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 data=[] urls=['https://www.izletv5.pw/p1','https://www.izletv5.pw/p2','https://www.izletv5.pw/p3','https://www.izletv5.pw/p4'] for site in urls: source=requests.get(site,headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0'}).text;list=re.findall('class="main-grids">(?s)(.*?)"pagination',source)[0] data +=re.findall('href="/(.*?)".title="(.*?)".+?src="/([^"]+)',list) return data

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests,base64 def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 inf=re.findall('live."(.*?)"."(\d+)',page_data)[0] source=requests.post('https://www.izletv5.pw/[makelist.param1]',headers={'Referer':'https://www.izletv5.pw/[makelist.param1]','User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0'},data={'hash':inf[0],'id':inf[1]}).text if '/' in source: return base64.b64decode(re.findall('(.*)',source)[0][::-1]+'==')+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer=https://www.izletv5.pw/[makelist.param1]' else: return base64.b64decode(re.findall('(.*)',source)[0][::-1].replace('_','/')+'==')+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer=https://www.izletv5.pw/[makelist.param1]'

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 return re.findall('href="/(.*?)".title="(.*?)".+?(?:live|time)">([^<]+)',re.findall('"channels scrollbar-outer list">(?s)(.*?)<section',page_data)[0])

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 mdata=re.findall('(?s)class="short-poster.+?href="(.*?)".+?src=(h.*?)&.+?alt="([^"]+)',requests.get('http://french-stream.tv/[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('’','\'')) count=re.findall('.+>(\d+).<(?:span.class="nav_ext"|/span>)',requests.get('http://french-stream.tv/[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore'))[0];pn=2;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='http://french-stream.tv/[makelist.param1]/page/'+str(pn)+'/';source=requests.get(page).content.decode('ascii','ignore') data +=re.findall('(?s)class="short-poster.+?href="(.*?)".+?src=(h.*?)&.+?alt="([^"]+)',source);pn +=1 data=mdata+data return data

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re,requests from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 IDs=re.findall('var.fields.+?['"]([^'"]+).*
.*
.*
.*?gGotop1',page_data)[-1] packed=jsunpack.unpack(requests.get('http://cloudvid.co/embed-'+re.findall('id="tmp".+?&&(.*?)%s'%IDs[0],page_data)[0],headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'[makelist2.param1]'}).content).replace('\','') return re.findall('file:"(h[^"]+).+?(?:7\d\d|4\d\d)',packed)[0]+'|user-agent=ipad'

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 mdata=re.findall('(?s)class="thumb".+?href="(.*?)".+?src="(.*?)".+?"([^"]+).*?"tag">(\d+)',requests.get('[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('’','\'')) count=re.findall('.+page/(\d+).+?label=.Last',requests.get('[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore'))[0];pn=2;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='[makelist.param1]page/'+str(pn)+'/';source=requests.get(page).content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('’','\'') data +=re.findall('(?s)class="thumb".+?href="(.*?)".+?src="(.*?)".+?"([^"]+).*?"tag">(\d+)',source);pn +=1 data=mdata+data return sorted(data,key=lambda k: k[3],reverse=True)

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 mdata=re.findall('(?s)class="thumb".+?href="(.*?)".+?src="(.*?)".+?"([^"]+).*?"tag">(\d+)',requests.get('[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('’','\'')) count=re.findall('.+page/(\d+).+?label=.Last',requests.get('[makelist.param1]').content.decode('ascii','ignore'))[0];pn=2;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='[makelist.param1]page/'+str(pn)+'/';source=requests.get(page).content.decode('ascii','ignore').replace('’','\'') data +=re.findall('(?s)class="thumb".+?href="(.*?)".+?src="(.*?)".+?"([^"]+).*?"tag">(\d+)',source);pn +=1 data=mdata+data return sorted(data,key=lambda k: k[3],reverse=True)

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): mdata=re.findall('ah-imagge".href="(.*?)".*?src="(.*?)".*?title="(.*?)"',page_data) count=re.findall('page/(\d+)/.*\n.*"next page-numbers"',page_data)[0];pn=2;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='http://allcalidad.com/tag/2018/page/'+str(pn)+'/';source=requests.get(page).content.decode('ascii','ignore') data +=re.findall('ah-imagge".href="(.*?)".*?src="(.*?)".*?title="(.*?)"',source);pn +=1 return mdata+data

regex.name: getUrl
url
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,base64 def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m): list=base64.b64decode(re.findall('atob."([^"]+)',page_data)[0]) return re.findall('source:"([^"]+)',base64.b64decode(re.findall('atob."([^"]+)',page_data)[0]))[0]+'|Referer=http://www.matbet6.tv/tr/channel/watch/bein-sport-1&User-Agent=iPad'
